alert.note: Alert for Lac Qui Parle (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 4:01PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lac qui Parle County through 430 PM CDT... At 401 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Dawson, or 21 miles west of Montevideo, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dawson. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 212 between mile markers 12 and 23. U.S. Highway 75 between mile markers 96 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
